content:
The coordinated work of percussion unmanned border groups of the Phoenix Unit of the Guard of the Revenge of the Revenge in the Bakhmut direction led to the destruction of the enemy BTR-82A.

This was reported at the State Tax Service.

Initially, on a site with a potential movement of enemy equipment, border guards carried out a remote mine.

After a while, the damaged and immobilized armored personnel carrier discovered a group of air intelligence and handed over to the target UAVs, which FPV-Drones and Discharges destroyed the enemy APC.

As reported by the Armyinform, in the Bakhmut direction our warriorsReflected 5 enemy attacksin the areas of settlements Ivanivske, Andreevka and Klyshchiyivka of Donetsk region.
title: In the Bakhmut direction, the defenders destroyed the enemy BTR-82A
description: This was reported at the State Tax Service. First on a site with a potential movement of hostile equipment ...
author: Army Inform
